title: Activating Associative Disease-Aware Vision Token Memory for LLM-Based X-ray Report Generation
details: X Wang, F Wang, H Wang, B Jiang, C Li, Y Wang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: X-ray image based medical report generation achieves significant progress in recent years with the help of the large language model, however, these models have not fully exploited the effective information in visual image regions, resulting in reports …
